Description: Topic selection and initial team meeting. Decision to build 'School Activity Booking System'.
Gathering requirements for Parents, Tutors, and Admins. Defining scope and deliverables.
Designing the Entity Relationship Diagram (ERD). Defining User, Activity, and Booking tables.
Setting up GitHub repository, Flask environment, virtual environment, and directory structure.
Implementing Login, Register, Password Hashing, and Session Management logic.
Coding the SQLAlchemy models (db.Model) and setting up migrations.
Implementing conflict detection (double booking prevention) and availability checks.
Creating the Tutor Dashboard for marking attendance and tracking student progress.
Adding CSRF protection (Flask-WTF), RBAC decorators, and Secure Headers.
Configuring SMTP with Gmail, creating HTML email templates, and Flask-Mail setup.
Implementing ReportLab for generating downloadable PDF invoices with QR codes.
Developing logic to auto-promote students from waitlist when spots open up.
Implementing iCalendar (RFC 5545) for .ics attachment generation.
Creating API endpoints for dashboard statistics and financial aggregation.
Full team testing of all modules working together. Bug fixing phase.
Comprehensive technical documentation of Email, PDF, and Integration modules.
Comprehensive technical documentation of Security, Auth, and RBAC modules.
Comprehensive technical documentation of Database, Models, and Booking Logic.
Comprehensive technical documentation of Backend Architecture and Attendance.
Adding persistence and display logic for attendance notes in tutor portal.
Merging all individual explanations and viva questions into final submission files.
